announcement.message: Apr 21, 2021: 11:30am EDT We are aware that some users are experiencing issues connecting to the HMDA Platform. We hope to have this resolved shortly.
announcement.heading: Maintenance

filingAnnouncement.message: We will be performing scheduled system maintenance on April 22nd from 8pm - 10pm EST. During this time users will be unable to log in to the Filing application or create new accounts.
filingAnnouncement.heading: Scheduled Maintenance
